zsh+iterm : clever and beautiful

Jul 1, 2020

Recently apple decided to move from old-friend bash to zsch. Thatâ€™s a good one. Plenty of plugins, autocomplete on another level and custom themes for visual joy and productivity.

Just check it out:

  • install zsh and iterm

  • install oh-my-zsh (with curl):

sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh)"

All setting now in ~/.zshrc and the framework itself in ~/.oh-my-zsh

  • set up a theme for iterm (powerlevel10k is supercool)
  • Andrey Geondzhian | PhD
